mapper.update: update t_link set delete_status = 'Delete',operator = #{operator},operate_time = now() where id = #{id} and delete_status = 'NotDelete'
update t_link set name = #{name},url = #{url},description = #{description},rank = #{rank},operator = #{operator},operate_time = now() where id = #{id} and delete_status = 'NotDelete'
mapper.select: select id,name,url,description,rank,delete_status as deleteStatus,operator,operate_time as operateTime,creator,create_time as createTime from t_link where delete_status = 'NotDelete' order by rank;
